alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Catano; Guaynabo; Toa Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 05 at 3:50PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following, Bayamon, Catano, Guaynabo and Toa Baja. * WHEN...Until 700 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Overflowing poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 348 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated additional heavy rain moving in to the advisory area. Urban and small stream flooding has been reported. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen over the past few hours. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will cause the ongoing urban and small stream flooding to continue. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
